short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that automatically likes on Tinder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tinder Auto Swiper is a convenient Chrome extension designed to automate the liking process on Tinder. With just a click, you can set a custom limit for likes and let the extension do the work for you. It's perfect for users who want to save time and maximize their matches.

Key features:
Easy to use: Simply click the extension icon to start
Customizable: Set your own like limit each time
Time-saving: Automatically likes profiles at a steady pace
Progress tracking: Displays the number of likes and time spent
Please note: Use this extension responsibly and be aware that it may violate Tinder's terms of service. Use at your own risk.
